Limited Availability - Do not share this document

Standard Icons

This site contains documentation for the deprecated HapYak plugin. Please go to the current Brightcove Interactivity documentation.

You can set the color and size of the icon using the style attribute - for example:

<i class="fal fa-tools" style="font-size:2rem;color:#33333;"></i>
